article_title: Stark ESC to hire part-time medical doctors

article_metadata.description: The Stark County Educational Service Center plans to hire two part-time medical doctors to help ensure that the ESC's 22-member districts can continue to be reimbursed through Medicaid for the services the districts provide to eligible students with disabilities. Medicaid provides health care for some low-income families, the elderly and people with disabilities.
article_metadata.author: Kelli Young  Repository staff writer
